body.l1: 2StackStudio is a hobbyist independent game development studio, run by a couple of UCLA grads from Beijing, China. It currently consists of a full stack artist, a full stack developer, a cat, a dog, and two computers. We are game lovers trying to leave a footprint in indie game community.
body.l2: 2StackStudio is focused on creating story rich, narrative driven RPGs with innovative combat and meaningful progression.

body.l1: Download desktop version for best experience.
body.l2: WebGL build is also available for convenience with limited graphics.

body.l1: Immerse in real-time strategic combat while simultaneously controlling up to three heroes.
body.l2: Master a variety of heroes, each with their unique mechanics under the flow of RPG style dual resource management.

body.l1: Summon a variety of powerful minions from artificial constructs to mythical creatures.
body.l2: Taunt, charge, guard, ambush. Every minion has their unique role and behavior to aid you in your battles.

body.l1: Cast an arsenal of arcane and creative spells to gain direct control over the battlefield.
body.l2: From damage over time to crowd control, discover every hero’s specialties and their unique ways to impress the enemy.

body.l1: Fight against a wide range of enemies from powerful mythical monsters to vicious cult leaders, each with different movements and attacks.
body.l2: Immerse in intense boss fights and defend yourself through multiple phases, learn their weaknesses and mechanics to turn the tide.
